mapper.update: update member set mem_name=#{member.mem_name}, mem_birth=#{member.mem_birth}, mem_zipcode=#{member.mem_zipcode}, mem_addr=#{member.mem_addr}, mem_addr_detail=#{member.mem_addr_detail}, mem_gender=#{member.mem_gender}, mem_phone=#{member.mem_phone}, mem_email=#{member.mem_email}, mem_img=#{member.mem_img}, mem_account=#{member.mem_account}, mem_bank_code=#{member.mem_bank_code} where mem_id=#{member.mem_id}

mapper.select: select mem_id as username, mem_pw as password, mem_name, mem_birth, mem_zipcode, mem_addr, mem_addr_detail, mem_state, mem_gender, mem_phone, mem_email, point_total, mem_account, mem_img, mem_lati, mem_longi, mem_eval, mem_bank_code, role as authority from member where mem_id = #{username}
